author: kevaundray
content:
Yeah putting it in the last blob would be smarter; we would put how many bytes have been padded in the last blob instead of the total number of bytes in that case though.

Noting: this assumes an access pattern where we only get a specific blob because if we are fetching all blobs, then it doesn't really matter where the encoding is, we would have `get_blobs_data` instead of `get_blob_data` in your example
